thread.title: Tania (Coffee Shop Owner, Eastern Suburbs)
thread.title_full: Prospa reviewed by Tania (Coffee Shop Owner, Eastern Suburbs)

author: Tania (Coffee Shop Owner, Eastern Suburbs)
title: Tania (Coffee Shop Owner, Eastern Suburbs)
text: I was amazed by their friendly staff that had a genuine interest in knowing my business and understanding the reasons of my cash-flow issues. They explained how they could help me, using very easy to understand terms. Unlike my bank, they took the time to talk, they assessed my finances really fast and I received the funds the same day! unbelievable! Thank you Prospa, I'll definitely come back if I need additional funds to expand my business, renovate my shop or prepare for busy periods!
